title: TiDB Grafana gRPC request source duration is inaccurate
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
v8.0.0 ~
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
Deploy a new cluster and check the gRPC request source duration metrics.

### What did you expect?
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/50897894/dc41842c-af15-4b28-b3a4-00a65ca9f506)

### What did happened?
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/50897894/ba102696-7ee9-4fd2-aee6-f8dfb606b460)
